author: Hannah Smith
content:
Hi all, just starting out on carnivore and am wondering how you get past your family eating the standard diet and having to shop for them, having the temptations in the house and also quitting alcohol. I’m now on day 3 with no slips in the food department but am still having some wine.
23 comments
Chad Bromley
It’s hard but it’s an easy excuse. Everyone I slip up I think damn if only that wasn’t in the house but then realise that ultimately it was still my choice to eat it.
My wife does now put all that junk in boxes so I can’t see it sitting on the shelf, that does help a lot

replies.content: Tell them you’re doing this for your health. I slowly start to replace items with healthier options. Also doing online click and collect you only buy what you need and not being tempted in store. Over time they will see the results. It’s easier to live… See more
It will pass and you will look at carb foods like you would look at a cardboard. Completely indifferent. Cooking it is a bit harder for me. The only thing I have soft spot is a freshly baked bread.
Don't buy booze you won't drink it

replies.reply_by: Brad Nils sounds easy but there are social situation where you catch up over wine and a good meal, now I can do neither (unless I cook my own meal 😜)
replies.content: I’m determined though so I will be cutting the wine 👍

I found the good thing about this lifestyle (don't call it diet anymore) is that family meals remain the same but I just have the meat. If it's a roast I get just meat. If spaghetti bologase I use some mince to make patties etc
Know your why! I found it easy, I don’t look at their food the same way anymore, not tempted one bit.
Watch any YouTube video you can regarding food addiction, preferably in the carnivore space.

replies.reply_by: Shan Aeril thanks, I have watched so many YouTube videos, I have tried carnivore a few times in the past and failed due to being the only one in the house eating this way, I have a much better chance of succeeding this time as my hubby has joined me 🤞
replies.content: Shan Aeril thanks, I have watched so many YouTube videos, I have tried carnivore a few times in the past and failed due to being the only one in the house eating this way, I have a much better chance of succeeding this time as my hubby has joined me 🤞

Start your own channel together documenting your progress - ups and downs, keep yourselves accountable, and you will be encouraged along the way by the amazing carnivore community commenting on your posts.
You remember what your past eating habits were like and as time goes on you know what makes you sick and sluggish..I have hopes my health conditions will improve bit by bit I think I'm getting there.
Hey good stuff giving it a try. You’ll soon find that your body will stop craving the sugar content and the temptation will disappear. I now crave a spoonful of duck fat to the disgust of my kids!
